i love people that see low bitrate and automaicly think its bad quality. have ever made a DVD before? have you even took the time to download any of my lost DVDs? these are great quality DVDs. the bitrate is low because it is ONE EPISODE. how about you download before you talk shit. i have not had one complaint of any of my LOST release. one more time for everone low bitrate DOES NOT mean its low quality or its not a DVD.

these are quality rips hands down
props to deathmule

These downloads are the dogs bollocks there is no better download on the net, Where i am we get these at least 6 months after the states so these make excellent watching with a very very near perfect quality, Cheers Deathmule it is much appriciated. Anyone who has the nerve to make negetive comments about the quality of these should take the time to sample the goods first!!!!!
